Plot: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.
Title: Black Snake Moan
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Christina Ricci, Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson
tomatoConsensus: Uninhibited performances, skillful direction, and a killer blues soundtrack elevate Black Snake Moan beyond its outlandish premise.
